page.title: 08Horticulture 2
page.content: Foster's Farm is entirely 'Pick your own'. The owner is the only full-time worker but he employs some people part-time between June and mid-August. The farm covers 15 acres and produces strawberries, raspberries, loganberries, red and black currants and gooseberries. Bees, essential in pollinating fruit blossom, are kept on a small-holding. 140 hives are kept. 120 hives are moved to farms in a 10 mile radius. The honey produced, about 30lb. per hive, is sold locally, and in Chelmsford and Braintree.
